name: Validate fallback response for invalid/gibberish input - Loading states and fallback messages
description:
Objective:
To ensure that when a user provides an unclear or malformed query (e.g., gibberish or special characters), 
the system responds with a proper fallback message such as 'Sorry, I didnâ€™t catch that...'

parameters.name: case
parameters.value: {'id': 'fallback_test_en', 'lang': 'en', 'user': '!@#$%^&*() gibberish input 123', 'golden': "I'm sorry, I'm not able to assist with your request", 'threshold': 0.8, 'must_contain': ['sorry', 'not able to assist', 'request']}

labels.name: story
labels.value: System should show fallback messages for gibberish or unclear input

labels.name: epic
labels.value: Fallback message appears for gibberish/invalid input
